soc.code.multiplayerPackage

Class ClientSetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • soc.code.multiplayerPackage.ClientSetup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ClientSetup
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class is meant to handle the multiplayer connection to the host for this client. It will have methods for sending and recieving data to and from the host (the server).
    Author:
    Greg
